title: Drawing, "Haven't You Got a Thin Best Seller?", 1936
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and grey wash on white paper
signed: Signed lower left in black ink: Helen E. Hokinson
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Katherine Strong Welman
description: Interior of a bookstore. The window of the store is seen to the left; shelves of books from center to right. A woman is seated in an armchair, in foreground, holding a book, speaking to another woman, standing at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Haven't You Got a Thin Best Seller?", 1936.
1936. Pen and black ink, brush and grey wash on white paper. Museum purchase through gift of Katherine Strong Welman. 1950-97-18.
